name.label: Name of the program
name.tooltip: Please be aware that name is used also as file name in the application layer for the source and header file

size.label: Size of the program memory
size.tooltip: Size of the program data memory

heapSize.label: Size of the program heap
heapSize.tooltip: Size of the program heap placed in the program memory

memory.label: Memory location of the Program
memory.tooltip: Memory location of the Program, all the program data will be stored here
